Projects

Open source projects I've contributed to.

Rare Colors - Rare Colors is a responsive web design project featuring some of the rarest pigments found in the natural world. Using those pigments as samples, I created a bold web design color palette for site themes.
Space Cats - Space Cats is a Virtual Reality experience set in a space station at zero-gravity. It was developed using the Unity3D engine for the HTC Vive.
Blog - Theme created for my blog, dedicated to UI/UX Design and software development commentary.
Busy B's Food Blog - Cooking blog template for busy ladies and gents who need some quick, delicious recipes.
